metadata.name: Clanza CR 200 mg 1 Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the treatment of functional bowel disorders and alleviating pain in renal colic

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Drotaverine is a spasmolytic agent by inhibiting PDE4 in smooth muscle cells

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Drotaverine can be decreased when used in combination with Patent Blue
Drotaverine may increase the vasodilatory activities of Isosorbide mononitrate
